name: Catapult Turtle (Pre-Errata)
desc: You can Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.

name: Dark Strike Fighter (Pre-Errata)
desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
You can Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Tributed monster's Level on the field x 200.

name: Sinister Serpent (Pre-Errata)
desc: During your Standby Phase, if there is a "Sinister Serpent" in your Graveyard: you can add this card from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End (Pre-Errata)
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster in your Graveyard. You can pay 1000 Life Points; send all cards in both players' hands and on the field to the Graveyard and inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card sent this way.

name: Exchange of the Spirit (Pre-Errata)
desc: While there are 15 or more cards in your Graveyard: Pay 1000 Life Points; Both players swap the card(s) in their Graveyard with the card(s) in their Deck. Then, both players shuffle their Deck.

name: Temple of the Kings (Pre-Errata)
desc: You can activate Trap Cards the turn they are Set. If you control "Mystical Beast of Serket" and this card: you can send both to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand, Deck or Extra Deck.

name: Crush Card Virus (Pre-Errata)
desc: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK; Check all monsters your opponent controls, your opponent's hand, and all cards they draw (until the end of your opponent's 3rd turn after this card's activation), and destroy all monsters with 1500 or more ATK.

name: Crush Card Virus (Pre-Errata)
desc: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK; Check all monsters your opponent controls, your opponent's hand, and all cards they draw (until the end of your opponent's 3rd turn after this card's activation), and destroy all monsters with 1500 or more ATK.

name: Ring of Destruction (Pre-Errata)
desc: Target 1 face-up monster; Destroy it and inflict damage to both players equal to its ATK.

name: Ring of Destruction (Pre-Errata)
desc: Target 1 face-up monster; Destroy it and inflict damage to both players equal to its ATK.

name: Twin-Headed Behemoth (Pre-Errata)
desc: During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed on the field and sent to the Graveyard this turn: Special Summon it from the Graveyard, and make its ATK and DEF 1000. You can only use the effect of each "Twin-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.

name: Dark Magician of Chaos (Pre-Errata)
desc: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: you can target 1 Spell Card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand. Banish any monster this card destroys by battle, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. If this face-up card would leave the field, banish it instead.

name: Lunalight Blue Cat (Anime)
desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Lunalight" monster you control; double its ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Lunar Eclipse
desc: If you control a "Lunalight" monster: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, "Lunalight" monsters you control are unaffected by, and cannot be targeted by, the effects of your opponent's Spell/Trap Cards.

name: Lunalight Cat Dancer (Anime)
desc:
2 "Lunalight" monsters
You can Tribute 1 "Lunalight" monster; this turn, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls twice each, but they cannot be destroyed by the first battle with this card.

name: Lunalight Purple Butterfly (Anime)
desc: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Fusion Monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK.

name: Lunalight White Rabbit (Anime)
desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; return it to the hand.

name: Lunalight Dance
desc: During the Battle Phase, if a "Lunalight" monster attacked: Change the battle position of all monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, halve their ATK and DEF until the end of the Battle Phase.

name: Cardian - Yanagi
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 11 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Kiri
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 12 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Kiri ni Houou
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 12 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Matsu
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 1 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Matsu ni Tsuru
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 1 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Sakura ni Maku
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 3 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Susuki
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 8 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Susuki ni Tsuki
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 8 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Yanagi ni Ono no Michikaze
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 11 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard. If this card is used as a Synchro Material, you can treat all monsters you control as Level 2 monsters.

name: Cardian - Ameshikou (Anime)
desc:
1 Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card was Synchro Summoned using "Cardian - Yanagi ni Ono no Michikaze", "Cardian - Matsu ni Tsuru", "Cardian - Susuki ni Tsuki" and "Cardian - Kiri ni Houou" as Synchro Materials, it gains these effects.
● You can choose to not draw during your Draw Phase.
● If you draw a card(s), this card's effects are negated.
● Each time your opponent draws a card(s), inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.

name: Hana Awase
desc: Special Summon 4 "Cardian" monsters with 100 ATK from your Deck in Attack Position, but they cannot be used as a Fusion, Synchro or Xyz material for a Summon, also they cannot be Tributed, except by a "Cardian" monster's effect.

name: Hanazumi
desc: Choose 3 "Cardian" monsters in your Deck and reveal them to your opponent; place them on the top of the Deck in any order.

name: No Cheaters Allowed
desc: If you control a "Cardian" Synchro Monster, and your opponent controls a monster(s) that was Special Summoned from the hand: You can return all monsters your opponent controls to the hand. If you do not control a "Cardian" Synchro Monster, destroy this card.

name: Chokoikoi
desc:
Draw 3 cards, reveal them and apply an effect to each 1, depending on the revealed cards.
● "Cardian" monster: Special Summon it, but its Level become 2 and its ATK and DEF become 0.
● Non-"Cardian" monster: Send it to the Graveyard, and if you do, take 1000 damage.

name: Fuda Aratame
desc: "Cardian" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

name: Cardian - Hagi ni Inoshishi
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 7 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Cardian - Botan ni Cho
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Tribute 1 Level 6 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard. If this card is used as a Synchro Material, you can treat all monsters you control as Level 2 monsters.

name: Cardian - Momiji ni Shika
desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 10 "Cardian" monster that was not Special Summoned by a "Cardian" monster's effect; Special Summon this card from your hand, then draw 1 card, and if you do, if it is not a "Cardian" monster that meets its Special Summon condition, send it to the Graveyard.

name: Lunalight Panther Dancer (Anime)
desc:
"Lunalight Cat Dancer " + 1 "Lunalight" monster
Cannot be destroyed by an opponent's card effects. This effect cannot be negated. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, twice each, but they cannot be destroyed by the first battle with this card. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: It gains 200 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.
